Auth Module¶

Authentication module

There are several ways to generate an Auth object:

# First method
# Requires a JSON file 
# with the following structure
# {
#   "ID": ...,
#   "SECRET: ...
# }
# where ID and SECRET are the Client ID and the Client Secret

auth = Auth.from_config_file("filename.json")

# Second method
# Requires a dict object
# with keys "ID" and "SECRET"
# where ID and SECRET are the Client ID and the Client Secret

auth = Auth.from_config_object(config_object_name

# Third method
# where ID and SECRET are the Client ID and the Client Secret

auth = Auth(ID, SECRET)
class Anilist.Auth(client_id, client_secret)¶

Representation of an authenticated connection to the Anilist API

Parameters:

  • client_id (int) – The ID of the API Client

  • client_secret (str) – The secret code of the API Client

classmethod from_config_file(file)¶

Authenticates an Auth object from a config file

Parameters:

file (str) – The config file’s name

Returns:

An authenticated Auth object

Return type:

Auth

classmethod from_config_object(config)¶

Authenticates an Auth object from a config object

Parameters:

config (dict) – The config object

Returns:

An authenticated Auth object

Return type:

Auth
